exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "nat_join" with "Init.Nat.add".

In environment H : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < q + (q + (q + (q + 0))) Hr' : 4 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 Hr : 2 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 n : nat Unable to unify "msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => power i (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) + 0)" with "∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2))".

original: rewrite Hw. apply msum_ext. intros i _. reflexivity.
